page.title: 01MILLOM
page.content: MILLOM IS IN CUMBRIA. AT THIS MOMENT 100 YEARS AGO A MINER WOULD BE GETTING OUT OF BED WHILE ANOTHER MINER WOULD GET IN HIS PLACE.MILLOM USED TO BE KNOWN FOR ITS ORE AND IRON MINING. WE HAVE FOUND OUT ABOUT THE SEA WALL. THERE USED TO BE TWO SEA WALLS, ONE COLLAPSED WHEN THEY MINED UNDERNEATH AND THE PUMPING WENT ON STRIKE. YOU CAN STILL SEE THE PART OF THE OLD SEA WALL AND YOU CAN STILL SEE ALL OF THE NEW ONE. IN BETWEEN THE SEA WALLS THERE IS NOW A WATER SPORTS AREA. IT BELONGS TO BLUE ANCHOR BUILDING SITE AND HOLIDAY SITE. IN BETWEEN THE SEA WALLS THERE ARE LOTS OF TREES
